scripts.fork:restart: npm run fork:down && npm run fork:up
scripts.hardhat:compile: npx hardhat compile --no-typechain && npx hardhat typechain
scripts.setup: npm run setup:mainnet && npm run setup:arb && npm run setup:op
scripts.deploy:core-mainnet: MODE=fork npx hardhat run scripts/hardhat/01.deploy-mainnet-core.ts --network mainnetFork
scripts.deploy:core-arb: MODE=fork npx hardhat run scripts/hardhat/02.deploy-l2-core.ts --network arbitrumFork
scripts.deploy:core-op: MODE=fork npx hardhat run scripts/hardhat/02.deploy-l2-core.ts --network opFork
scripts.deploy:root-arb: MODE=fork TARGET=arbitrumFork npx hardhat run scripts/hardhat/03.deploy-root-gauges.ts --network mainnetFork
scripts.deploy:root-op: MODE=fork TARGET=optimismFork npx hardhat run scripts/hardhat/03.deploy-root-gauges.ts --network mainnetFork
scripts.deploy:child-arb: MODE=fork npx hardhat run scripts/hardhat/04.deploy-child-gauges.ts --network arbitrumFork
scripts.deploy:child-op: MODE=fork npx hardhat run scripts/hardhat/04.deploy-child-gauges.ts --network opFork
scripts.add-gauges:arb: MODE=fork TARGET=arbitrumFork hardhat run scripts/hardhat/05.add-gauges.ts --network mainnetFork
scripts.all:arb: npm run deploy:core-mainnet && npm run deploy:core-arb && npm run deploy:root-arb && npm run deploy:child-arb && npm run add-gauges:arb
scripts.vote:arbFork: TARGET=arbitrumFork npx hardhat run scripts/hardhat/fork/vote.ts --network mainnetFork
